# range

**Type Property**

The character range.

## Declaration

```swift
static let range: NSAttributedString.TextLayoutSectionKey
```

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSValue] object containing an `NSRange` representing a character range. The default value is a range covering the entire string.

## Getting keys for text layouts

- **orientation**: The orientation of the text.
title: range
